source:
%%sql   

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_addresses

AS

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 5
        THEN CONCAT('00',Staff_Number)
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 4
        THEN CONCAT('50',Staff_Number)        
        ELSE Staff_Number
    END as Staff_Number,
    Street_and_House_Number,
    `2nd_Address_Line`,
    City,
    District,
    Postal_Code,
    Region_State_Province_Count,
    to_timestamp(Start_Date) AS Start_Date,
    to_timestamp(End_Date) AS End_Date,
    Charting_Officer,
    Charting_Officer_for_Inspector,
    Subs_PS_Group,
    Tel_No,
    Personal_Mobile,
    Work_Mobile,
    to_timestamp(Chngd_on) AS Chngd_on,
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_addresses T1
INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(expected_from) AS Max_expectedfrom FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_addresses) MEF ON T1.expected_from = MEF.Max_expectedfrom

%%sql   

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_email

AS

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 5
        THEN CONCAT('00',Staff_Number)
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 4
        THEN CONCAT('50',Staff_Number)        
        ELSE Staff_Number
    END as Staff_Number,
    first_name,
    last_name,
    email_address,
    text_line_manager,
    lm_e_mail,
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_email T1
INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(expected_from) AS Max_expectedfrom FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_email) MEF ON T1.expected_from = MEF.Max_expectedfrom
